twcore.bots.racingbot
Class RbTWRC

java.lang.Object
  twcore.bots.racingbot.RacingBotExtension
      twcore.bots.racingbot.RbTWRC

public class RbTWRC
extends RacingBotExtension

Bot for TWRC updates Also allows ops to update points after races.

Version:
2.3
Author:
Jacen Solo

handleNormal

public void handleNormal(java.lang.String opName)
Updates all the databases for the last normal race. 2 points for leading a lap. 2 points for leading the most laps. top 10 get points 1st = 10p, 2nd = 9p, 3rd = 8p......10th = 1p

handleBig

public void handleBig(java.lang.String opName)
Updates all the databases for the last race if it was a big/major race. 2 points for leading a lap. 2 points for leading the most. Points - Position + 1 for finishing.

handleMarathon

public void handleMarathon(java.lang.String opName)
Updates all of the databases for the last race if it was a marathon 2 points for leading a lap. 10 points for leading the most. 30 points for winning.

writeLog

public void writeLog(java.lang.String message)
Writes point changes to log.txt

Parameters:
message - - message to be written to the log.txt file
